Package camzup.core

Class PngParser.IHDRChunk

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.PngParser.Chunk
camzup.core.PngParser.IHDRChunk
Enclosing class:
PngParser
public static class PngParser.IHDRChunk
extends PngParser.Chunk
Defines a header chunk for portable network graphics (.png) information. Contains a type description, a measure of the length of data in the chunk, the data, and a cyclic redundancy check (CRC).

The data is expected to be 13 bytes long. Within this data should be:
  1. width: 4 bytes, in 0 to 3
  2. height: 4 bytes, in 4 to 7
  3. bit depth: 1 byte, at 8
  4. color type: 1 byte, at 9
  5. compression method: 1 byte, at 10
  6. filter method: 1 byte, at 11
  7. interlace method: 1 byte, at 12

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a header chunk from four byte arrays.

    Promotes a chunk to an IHDRChunk.

  • Constructor Details

    • IHDRChunk

      public IHDRChunk​(byte[] length, byte[] type, byte[] data, byte[] crc)
      Constructs a header chunk from four byte arrays.
      Parameters:
      length - the length array
      type - the type array
      data - the data array
      crc - the CRC array

    • IHDRChunk

      public IHDRChunk​(PngParser.Chunk chunk)
      Promotes a chunk to an IHDRChunk. Should only be done if the chunk's type is known to be "IHDR".
      Parameters:
      chunk - the chunk

  • Method Details

    • bitDepth

      public int bitDepth()
      Returns the number of bits per sample. Valid values are 1, 2, 4, 8, and 16 bits per sample.
      Returns:
      the bit depth

    • colorFormat

      public PngParser.ColorFormat colorFormat()
      Returns the color format of the image as an enumeration constant.
      Returns:
      the format

    • colorFormatInt

      public int colorFormatInt()
      Returns the color format of the image as an integer. Expected values are:
      • 0: grey scale
      • 2: red, green, blue
      • 3: indexed
      • 4: gray scale with alpha
      • 6: red, green, blue and alpha
      Returns:
      the color type

    • compression

      public int compression()
      Returns the compression method of the image. Expected to be zero.
      Returns:
      the compression method

    • filter

      public int filter()
      Returns the filter method of the image. Expected to be zero.
      Returns:
      the filter method

    • height

      public int height()
      Gets the height of the image as an integer. Composites bytes 4 to 7 of the data array.
      Returns:
      the height

    • interlace

      public int interlace()
      Gets the interlace method of the image. Expected to be either 0 (no interlace) or 1 (adam7).
      Returns:
      the interlace method

    • width

      public int width()
      Gets the width of the image as an integer. Composites bytes 0 to 3 of the data array.
      Returns:
      the width
